description:
Natural language analytics for retail product sales and inventory. Ask questions in plain English to analyze sales, inventory, promotions, and customer loyalty across 100+ locations.

DATA COVERAGE:
• 100+ stores (franchise & corporate) across multiple states
• 50+ product SKUs across multiple categories
• Daily sales: revenue, units, transactions, discounts, returns
• Real-time inventory: on-hand, forecasts, stockouts, replenishment needs
• Customer loyalty program data and penetration metrics
• Store, product, and date dimensions for multi-dimensional analysis

AVAILABLE ANALYTICS:
1. Sales Performance - Revenue trends, transaction volumes, promotional ROI, brand performance, store rankings
2. Inventory Health - Stock levels, days of supply, stockout alerts, replenishment priorities, overstock
3. Store Operations - Franchise vs corporate analysis, geographic performance, store type comparisons
4. Product Analytics - Brand comparisons, premium vs standard, SKU performance, seasonal trends
5. Customer Loyalty - Program penetration, member behavior, transaction value analysis
6. Time Analysis - Daily/monthly/quarterly trends, year-over-year comparisons, rolling windows (7/30/90 days)

USE CASES:
Sales managers (regional tracking) • Category managers (product mix) • Supply chain (inventory optimization) • 
Store operators (replenishment) • Marketing (promotional ROI) • Regional directors (store comparisons) • 
Finance (revenue analysis)

TIME PERIODS:
Historical data with daily granularity. Supports current month, last 7/30/90 days, quarterly, yearly, 
and year-over-year comparisons.
title: ${project_name} Sales & Inventory Analytics
